content: in this legal case a holographic will made by the deceased father was declared partially null the court found that the plaintiffs legitimate share was breached and reduced the bequests made to the defendants the plaintiffs claim for the refund of profits was rejected but the defendants were granted half of the profits from certain properties the court confirmed the estate expenses incurred by the defendants and ordered the plaintiff to contribute to these expenses the plaintiffs counterclaims were rejected and the legal costs were distributed among the parties the court also resolved the issue of disputed properties by excluding certain properties from the estate overall the court partially accepted the plaintiffs claim and partially accepted the defendants counterclaim
